amendment.description: Amendment authorizes $40 million to reimburse States and localities for the costs associated with having State and local law enforcement trained and certified by DHS' Immigration and Customs Enforcement to enforce Federal immigration laws.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to authorize $40,000,000 to be appropriated for FY 2006 to reimburse States and localities for the costs associated with having State and local law enforcement trained and certified by DHS' Immigration and Customs Enforcement to enforce Federal immigration laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
